title: YouTube tests gifting memberships as its latest move to compete with Twitch
content:
While Amazon-owned Twitch has been struggling a bit amid recent controversial changes to its platform, YouTube is capitalizing on the shake-up. This week, YouTube announced that it is testing Membership Gifting, a feature similar to what Twitch offers.

moreâ€¦

The post YouTube tests gifting memberships as its latest move to compete with Twitch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: YouTube has started testing Membership Gifting, which allows viewers to gift channel memberships to fellow viewers.
